newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-MANCHESTER UNITED V CHELSEA CHARITY SHIELD TEAMS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-MANCHESTER UNITED V CHELSEA CHARITY SHIELD TEAMS.

text.p: Teams for the F.A. Charity Shield pre-season match between English premier league champions Manchester United and Cup winners Chelsea on Sunday:

Manchester United - 1-Peter Schmeichel, 3-Denis Irwin, 5- Ronnie Johnsen, 6-Gary Pallister, 8-Nicky Butt, 9-Andy Cole 10-Teddy Sheringham, 11-Ryan Giggs, 12-Phil Neville, 16-Roy Keane, 18-Paul Scholes.

Chelsea - 1-Ed De Goey, 5-Frank Leboeuf, 6-Steve Clarke, 8-Gustavo Poyet, 10-Mark Hughes, 11-Denis Wise, 16-Roberto Di Matteo, 17-Danny Granville, 20-Frank Sinclair, 25-Gianfranco Zola, 28-Jody Morris.
